intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What is your favorite breakfast food?
Can you play a musical instrument?

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. The waiter asks you.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to eat?

respond_situations.description: You are at a clothing shop. A customer asks you.

respond_situations.starter_line: Do you want to go to the park?
respond_situations.description: You are talking to a friend.

ask_situations.instruction: You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.
You want to find out about school activities. You ask a teacher. ..
You are shopping. Ask the shopkeeper for the price of a toy.

listening_script.text: I clean the house every Saturday. I dust the shelves. I vacuum the carpet. I wash the dishes. My family helps me.

questions.question: What do I do on Saturday?

follow_up_questions.question: What do you like to do on weekends?
Where do you go on the weekend?
Who do you spend your weekend with?
How do you feel on the weekend?
